text: Nelson Shanks (December 23, 1937 - August 28, 2015) was an American artist and painter. His most famous work is likely his portrait of Diana, Princess of Wales, completed in 1996. The painting was first shown at Hirschl & Adler Gallery in New York City, April 24 to June 28, 1996. Shanks died of prostate cancer at his home in Andalusia, Pennsylvania on August 28, 2015 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American painters Category:Artists from New York (state) Category:Cancer deaths in Pennsylvania Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:People from Rochester, New York
title: Nelson Shanks
